original_text: But God was kind to me. Christ Jesus showed that he was completely patient with me, the worst person. That was an example to those people who would later believe in him. They would believe and receive life for ever with God.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 긍휼을 입은 까닭은 예수 그리스도께서 내게 먼저 일체 오래 참으심을 보이사 후에 주를 믿어 영생 얻는 자들에게 본이 되게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: But God was kind to me.
Christ Jesus showed that he was completely patient with me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수님은 내게 완전히 인내하심을 보여주셨습니다,

sentences.original_text: who would later believe in him.
and receive life for ever with God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님과 함께 영원한 생명을 받을 것입니다.
